artist: Artist: Attributed to Baldassare Franceschini (il Volterrano); Artist: Formerly attributed to Correggio (Antonio Allegri)
description: recto: upper bodies of figures, seen from low viewpoint; one figure holds a flat object (book or tray?) with both hands on bottom of object, at left; verso not examined--received framed
provenance: Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara, Calif.; Alfred K. Moir Trust; bequeathed to MIA, 2012.
title: Study of Figures in a Dome (recto); Figure Study (verso)
